If movement is possible, the player is moved.

Sends the emotion to everyone in the room, including the player issuing it.

If movement is possible, the player is moved.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.quit
The player is removed from the Controller's storage list, and all player's are informed of their departure.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.say
Sends the message to all the players in the same room, by working through the players_list that the Controller has.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.shout
Effectively sends a message to everyone that is on the MUD.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.south
If movement is possible, the player is moved.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.user
Sets the player's name to the new one that they specify, as long as someone doesn't already have it!
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.west
If movement is possible, the player is moved.
call(Controller, Player, StringTokenizer). Method in class minimud.who
Gives a complete list of all the players on the MUD, with the inclusion of the player themselves.
